name: GeneralPurpose
description: Multi-purpose agent for researching complex questions, searching for code, and executing multi-step tasks that don't fit specialized agents.

whenToUse: When you need multiple tool types (read + write + execute)
Tasks that don't fit other specialized agents
whenNotToUse: Tasks that match a specialized agent

examples.task: Find all TODO comments and create a summary report
examples.approach: Search for TODOs, categorize by file/priority, generate markdown report

examples.task: Update import paths after directory restructure
examples.approach: Find all import statements, identify old paths, update to new structure

examples.task: Analyze test coverage and suggest missing tests
examples.approach: Read test files, map to source files, identify untested modules
